thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 03 May 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: Natural Grocers By Vitamin Cottage Reports Q2 Earnings Per Share $0.15

author: Reuters Editorial
title: Natural Grocers By Vitamin Cottage Reports Q2 Earnings Per Share $0.15
text:
May 3 (Reuters) - Natural Grocers By Vitamin Cottage Inc :
* NATURAL GROCERS BY VITAMIN COTTAGE ANNOUNCES SECOND QUARTER FISCAL 2018 RESULTS
* Q2 EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.15 * Q2 SALES $215.9 MILLION VERSUS I/B/E/S VIEW $211.4 MILLION
* Q2 SAME STORE SALES ROSE 7.1 PERCENT * Q2 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.12 — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* RAISES FY 2018 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW TO $0.43 TO $0.50 * INCREASED ITS OUTLOOK FOR DAILY AVERAGE COMPARABLE STORE SALES GROWTH FOR FISCAL 2018
* NARROWED ITS EARNINGS PER SHARE OUTLOOK FOR FISCAL 2018. * BOARD OF DIRECTORS HAS AUTHORIZED A TWO-YEAR EXTENSION OF COMPANY’S $10 MILLION SHARE REPURCHASE PROGRAM
* SEES FY 2018 DAILY AVERAGE COMPARABLE STORE SALES GROWTH 3.5% TO 4.5%
* FY2018 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.22 — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon:
Our
